justification: The study used a semi-structured interview guide to collect data on the experience of raging in video games, including its behavioral, cognitive, emotional, and environmental characteristics.

The Game Addiction Scale (GAS) was used to evaluate video game addiction among participants and to assess whether gaming use is considered problematic based on their scores and experiences related to addiction.
The semi-structured interview guide used was based on the qualitative research on online poker tilt, to compare and contrast the tilting behavior in poker with rage in video games.
